entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023
